changes: Fixed an issue where a fleet displayed the incorrect amount of ships in the fleet

Fixed an issue where players could not start crafting recipes above Tier 1
Added an indicator at the right bottom of the screen to show if there's any pending transactions
Display mining-related values and calculations for Armstrong ships should now be shown correctly
Fuel, ammo and cargo for mining and subwarping fleets is now visualized in real-time
The settings interface has been renewed
Docked fleets now show the same sector name as undocked fleets
Several improvements for mobile devices
Mining now shows a countdown timer in the fleet status
The fleet disband confirmation dialog now closes upon confirmation
Estimated food used for mining is now calculated properly
Transaction sending for stop mining is now more explicit
Added a confirmation for disband fleet button
Added a changelog to the settings menu
Fixed flashing cargo in in the fleet tooltip
Improved fleet statuses
Removed fixed width of player fleets container
Exclude respawned fleets in hangar actions
Fixed the fleet mining view so it doesn't cause blank screens
Calculating the mined amount is now more accurate
Added a disband action to the fleet command buttons
Adjusted the basic mobile dialog size for functionality
'Show all fleets' setting is now saved in the browser cache
Fleet locations while warping should now render correctly
Adjusted the color scheme of fleets based on the largest ship in the fleet
Fixed a bug where the map view would snap to your CSS when hovering another fleet
Fixed issues with installing finished upgrades at a starbase
Fixed an issue that caused the 'partially disbanded fleets' banner to not show at all
Fixed an issue where the connection flow would not work after disconnecting
Removed unused states for crafting processes causing them to appear as 'Pending Materials'
Show the correct status for claimed crafts
Fixed an issue when switching wallets
Clicking on an amount in the inventory will now put it in the input field
Made the font size for some values dynamic to fit larger values better inside of the views
Fixed the wallet not being able to auto-connect
Fixed scanning on sectors with a starbase
Show food balance instead of toolkit balance in the sector survey overview
